item.description:
Please RSVP on my other site. "Hartford Fun Group"http://www.meetup.com/Hartford-Fun-Group/events/112909352/

Reminder that we only play with a soft training volleyball. We do not play with a hard regulation type ball.

Special is $5.00 Per Person


After Volleyball we will go to a nearby restaurant...

Golden Irene's in East Windsor

http://www.goldenirenes.com/
Check out there menu and atmosphere. Even if you do not play volleyball with us you can still meet us there at 9:15PM

=== Legal Stuff ===

By clicking on "Count Me In" or "Yes" or "Maybe" for this event you agree, warrant, and covenant as follows: In consideration for accepting this entry, I, the registrant, intending to be legally bound, hereby, for myself, my heirs, my executors and administrators, do waive and release any and all rights for damages I may have against any parties or persons connected with the Hartford Fun Group meetup group for and related to the above listed event. I attest and verify that I am physically fit to participate in any portion of this above listed event. I grant Hartford Fun Group permission to use any photographs, film or videotapes of this event for any purpose
item.name: VOLLEYBALL " Special-Only $5.00" Thursday,Enfield
